body_html:
@Sanjeev2487
I faced the same error.I
you should run a new container use nvidia-docker,such as:

nvidia-docker run -it pytorch/pytorch:nightly-devel-cuda9.2-cudnn7 /bin/bash

Instead of : docker run -it pytorch/pytorch:nightly-devel-cuda9.2-cudnn7 /bin/bash

then,you maybe can import torch normally!

body:
@Sanjeev2487 
I faced the same error.I
you should run a new container use nvidia-docker,such as:

nvidia-docker run -it pytorch/pytorch:nightly-devel-cuda9.2-cudnn7 /bin/bash

Instead of : docker run -it pytorch/pytorch:nightly-devel-cuda9.2-cudnn7 /bin/bash

then,you maybe can import torch normally!
